sentences.sentence: But peace of mind - that is His final guerdon of approval, the fondest insignia of His love, he bestows it charily.
sentences.translation: 但是安心-这是他的最后的批准，他的爱的徽章。

sentences.sentence: He bestows it charily. Most men are never blessed with it: others wait all their lives-yes, far into advanced age-for this gift to descend upon them.
sentences.translation: 他施予它的时候很谨慎，多数人从未享受过，有些人则等待了一生——是的，一直到暮年，才等到赏赐降临他们身上。
